original_text: Hear the Lord, those who live in heaven! Listen to him, you people on the earth! Listen carefully because the Lord has spoken! He says, ‘I have helped my children to grow. I took care of them but now they have turned against me!
korean_text: 하늘이여 들으라 땅이여 귀를 기울이라 여호와께서 말씀하시기를 내가 자식을 양육하였거늘 그들이 나를 거역하였도다

sentences.original_text: Hear the Lord, those who live in heaven!
Listen to him, you people on the earth!
sentences.korean_translation: 땅에 사는 사람들아, 그에게 귀를 기울이라!

sentences.original_text: Listen carefully because the Lord has spoken!
He says, 'I have helped my children to grow.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 말씀하시기를, 내가 내 자녀들을 자라게 도왔다.

sentences.original_text: but now they have turned against me!'
